attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This website is supposed to give the people the right to make petitions to the Government. The Government has decided to ignore the democratic process and ignore petitions even if they are hundreds of thousands strong. This epetition service is a waste of time and bandwidth because the government doesn't want to be influenced by the Plebs and has already made its mind up on issues.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
